description:
Orcas are a rare sight in the wild, unless you have this blanket. Add in 100% recycled fabric and 3D hollow fiber insulation to the mix, you’ll be using this everywhere and feeling good about it.

  • 100% recycled polyester for both the outer shell and the insulation to keep you using it for days to come
  • DWR finish to shed any light rain or food that happens to come its way
  • The included Cape Clip® keeps your hands free for worry free cooking. Or to be a superhero
  • Corner loops mean you can stake it out for maximum space for that cloud watching
name: Rumpl Pacific Rim National Park Puffy Blanket
